item.title: April Build Update
item.description: An April build update We got some walls up! Table Of Contents What we’ve done A timeline of sorts What’s next? What we’ve done What a hectic last few days! Erny and I took some time off to focus on the tiny house full-time over the Easter break. For us, the past week has been a rollercoaster ride of highs and lows, with the weather constantly threatening to rain on our parade.
